objects.text: 64 PACK | BOLD CRUNCH | PERFECT FOR PARTIES

product_details.description: Product Description          The chip that packs a flavorful punch with the classic crunch. Boldly seasoned with three cheeses, tomatoes, onions and a savory blend of spices. Indulge yourself or share with large gatherings.             Manufacturer Contact Information          Plano, Tx 75024-4099 Pack of 64, 1.75 ounce large single serving bags (total of 112 ounces) Doritos tortilla chips with classic nacho cheese flavor Made of whole corn; flavorings feature real cheddar cheese Crunchy straight from the bag or after scooping up dip or salsa Ships in Certified Frustration Free Packaging Brand - Doritos ** Flavor - Nacho Cheese ** Unit Count - 112.0 Ounce ** Number of Items - 64 ** Type - Tortilla Chip **

banner_details:
This banner features a high-contrast and energetic design that promotes a snack product with a bold, dynamic layout. The background is split into diagonal layers of deep red and dark maroon, accented with geometric yellow-orange beams and faint white circles radiating outward from the center, creating a spotlight effect on the product. The central focus is a realistic product image ("product_image") positioned mid-frame. At the top, a bold headline ("heading") in white, sans-serif font commands attention, followed by a yellow subheading ("subheading") that highlights the flavor. Beneath the product, a concise description ("description"), prominent pricing ("price"), and a call-to-action button ("cta") with a black background ("cta_background") and yellow text complete the promotional message.

**Color Palette**:
- Deep Red (#C00000)
- Dark Maroon (#8B0000)
- Black (#000000)
- Bright Yellow (#FFCC00)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The Doritos Nacho Cheese package utilizes a vibrant and bold color palette to emphasize energy and flavor. The dominant red background (#C8102E) evokes passion and appetite, capturing immediate attention. The chips themselves showcase a rich yellow-orange (#F9A825), highlighted with darker specks for texture. Black (#000000) and white (#FFFFFF) elements in the logo add strong contrast, ensuring brand visibility. The triangle motif features a fiery gradient of orange (#FF6F00) and yellow (#FFEB3B), blending seamlessly to reinforce heat and boldness. Together, these colors are used dynamically—blending for depth while strategically contrasted for instant impact, perfect for a fiery, flavorful banner design.
